TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventProvider extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 该类可用于写入事件。

span.span: Use this class to write events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用和方法编写的事件, 必须在清单中定义事件 ; 使用方法编写的事件不需要清单。To consume events written using the and methods, the events must be defined in a manifest; events written using the method do not require a manifest. 事件可以包含以下托管数据类型:Events can contain the following managed data types: - boolbool - BooleanBoolean - bytebyte - charchar - decimaldecimal - doubledouble - floatfloat - GUIDGuid - intint - IntPtrIntPtr - longlong - sbytesbyte - shortshort - stringstring - uintuint - UInt64UInt64 如果清单中的事件使用`Boolean`的类型为, 则不能在托管代码中`Boolean`使用数据类型编写数据元素。If an event in your manifest uses the `Boolean` in-type, you cannot write the data element using a `Boolean` data type in your managed code. 清单`Boolean`中的类型需要一个4字节的值, 托管代码中的`Boolean`数据类型为1字节。The `Boolean` in-type in your manifest expects a 4-byte value, and a `Boolean` data type in managed code is 1-byte. 相反, 您必须使用`int`数据类型来写入值。Instead, you must use an `int` data type to write the value. 如果要记录一个`Boolean`值, 请使用清单中的 UInt8 类型。If you want to log a `Boolean` value, use the UInt8 in-type in your manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 注册提供程序。Registers the provider. 若要在完成后删除注册, 请调用方法。To remove the registration when finished, call the method.

exception.span: 没有足够的内存来完成该操作。

span.span: There is not enough memory to complete the operation.

exception.span: 命名空间中的类仅适用于 Windows Vista。

span.span: The classes in the namespace work only on Windows Vista.
The parameter cannot be null.

exception.span: 由 ETW 子系统返回的错误。

span.span: An error returned by the ETW subsystem.

summary.span: 从 ETW 子系统中移除提供程序的注册并释放所有非托管资源。

span.span: Removes the provider's registration from the ETW subsystem and releases all unmanaged resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应在完成时调用此方法, 而不是等待系统释放资源。You should call this method when finished instead of waiting for the system to dispose of the resources.

exception.span: 由 ETW 子系统返回的错误。

span.span: An error returned by the ETW subsystem.

summary.span: 获取与事件写入失败相关联的最后一个错误。

span.span: Gets the last error associated with an event write failure.

returns.span: 该值可用于确定事件写入失败的原因。

span.span: Use the value to determine the cause of an event write failure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果、和方法无法写入事件, 则设置此值。 The , , and methods set this value if they fail to write the event. 这是静态方法。This is a static method.

summary.span: 确定该提供程序是否已经由某个会话启用。

span.span: Determines whether a session enabled the provider.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsEnabled ();
.method public hidebysig instance bool IsEnabled() cil managed
Public Function IsEnabled () As Boolean
public: bool IsEnabled();
member this.IsEnabled : unit -> bool

summary.span: 确定该提供程序是否已经由某个会话启用，而与用来启用该提供程序的级别值和关键字值无关。

span.span: Determines whether any session enabled the provider, regardless of the level and keyword values used to enable the provider.

returns.span: 如果已为某个会话启用该提供程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: Is if the provider is enabled to any session; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 提供程序不调用此方法来确定提供程序是否已由会话启用;提供程序只是写入事件, ETW 确定是否将事件记录到会话中。Typically, a provider does not call this method to determine whether the provider has been enabled by a session; the provider simply writes the event, and ETW determines whether the event is logged to the session. 如果提供程序需要执行额外的工作来生成事件, 则提供程序可能需要调用此函数。A provider may want to call this function if the provider needs to perform extra work to generate the event. 在这种情况下, 首先调用此函数可节省资源和时间。In this case, calling this function first may save resources and time.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsEnabled (byte level, long keywords);
.method public hidebysig instance bool IsEnabled(unsigned int8 level, int64 keywords) cil managed
Public Function IsEnabled (level As Byte, keywords As Long) As Boolean
public: bool IsEnabled(System::Byte level, long keywords);
member this.IsEnabled : byte * int64 -> bool

param.name: level
param.span: 包括在该事件中的详细程度。

span.span: Level of detail included in the event.

param.name: keywords
param.span: 指定事件类别的位掩码。

span.span: Bit mask that specifies the event category.

param.span: 此掩码应当与在该事件的清单中定义的关键字掩码相同。

span.span: This mask should be the same keyword mask that is defined in the manifest for the event.

summary.span: 确认是否有任何会话正在从该提供程序请求指定的事件。

span.span: Determines whether any session is requesting the specified event from the provider.

returns.span: 如果有任何会话正在请求指定的事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: Is if any session is requesting the specified event; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 提供程序不调用此方法来确定会话是否请求了指定的事件;提供程序只是写入事件, ETW 确定是否将事件记录到会话中。Typically, a provider does not call this method to determine whether a session requested the specified event; the provider simply writes the event, and ETW determines whether the event is logged to a session. 如果提供程序需要执行额外的工作来生成事件, 则提供程序可能需要调用此函数。A provider may want to call this function if the provider needs to perform extra work to generate the event. 在这种情况下, 首先调用此函数来确定会话是否请求了事件, 可能会节省资源和时间。In this case, calling this function first to determine if a session requested the event or not, may save resources and time.

param.name: id
param.span: 由 方法返回的唯一活动标识符。

span.span: A unique activity identifier that the method returns.

summary.span: 设置由 方法使用的当前活动标识符。

span.span: Sets the current activity identifier used by the methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标识符存储在线程上下文中。The identifier is stored in the thread context. 请注意, 在 .net framework 版本3.5 中, 你必须将此方法`id`的参数和属性值设置为相同的标识符值。Note that in version 3.5 of the .NET framework, you had to set the `id` parameter of this method and the property value to the same identifier value. 但在 framework 版本4.0 中, 方法会自动为你设置相关活动标识符。However, in version 4.0 of the framework, the method automatically sets the correlation activity identifier for you. 这是静态方法。This is a static method.

summary.span: 写入某个事件。

span.span: Writes an event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用清单来定义事件, 请使用这些方法。Use these methods if you use a manifest to define your events.

Console.WriteLine(EventProvider.GetLastWriteEventError()); ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用在线程上下文中设置的活动 ID 来标识此组件。The method uses the activity ID set in the thread context to identify this component. 若要设置活动 ID, 请调用方法。To set the activity ID, call the method. 如果使用类, 则不会使用方法来指定活动 ID。If you use the class, you do not use the method to specify the activity ID. 改为访问属性以获取对象。Instead, access the property to get the object. 然后, 将属性设置为活动 ID。Then, set the property to the activity ID. 还必须将设置`relatedActivityId` 为值。You must also set the `relatedActivityId` to a value.

exception.span: 如果 包含的对象或字符串太多。

span.span: If contains too many objects or strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用在线程上下文中设置的活动 ID 来标识此组件。The method uses the activity ID set in the thread context to identify this component. 若要设置活动 ID, 请调用方法。To set the activity ID, call the method.
